name: Poor Doge
description: PDOGE, born into a humble Doge family, emerges above the frenzy of derivative coins. The time has come for this iconic meme to reclaim its throne. With unwavering determination, PDOGE aspires to reinstate the glory of meme coins. A robust community renders $PDOGE a coin for the people. Allow the potency of memes to lead you to greatness. This coin stands for action against dog violence and provides support for homeless dogs. Join us in countering dog theft, fighting, and the consumption of dog meat. Volunteer, raise awareness, and rescue dogs in need.
